segment.source: MED-V 1.0 Release Notes
segment.target: MED-V 1.0 Release Notes

segment.source: MED-V 1.0 Release Notes
segment.target: MED-V 1.0 Release Notes

segment.source: MED-V 1.0 Release Notes
segment.target: MED-V 1.0 Release Notes

segment.source: Known Issues with MED-V
segment.target: Known Issues with MED-V

segment.source: This section provides the most up-to-date information about general issues with the Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) platform.
segment.target: This section provides the most up-to-date information about general issues with the Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) platform.

segment.source: These issues do not appear in the product documentation and in some cases might contradict existing product documentation.
segment.target: These issues do not appear in the product documentation and in some cases might contradict existing product documentation.

segment.source: Whenever possible, these issues will be addressed in later releases.
segment.target: Whenever possible, these issues will be addressed in later releases.

segment.source: File downloads do not follow Web redirection rules
segment.target: File downloads do not follow Web redirection rules

segment.source: File downloads do not follow Web redirection rules set in a MED-V workspace policy.
segment.target: File downloads do not follow Web redirection rules set in a MED-V workspace policy.

segment.source: When expanding a console-published application window to full screen, it disappears
segment.target: When expanding a console-published application window to full screen, it disappears

segment.source: If you expand a console-published application (such as cmd.exe) window to full screen inside a MED-V workspace configured in seamless integration mode, the application window might disappear or not respond.
segment.target: If you expand a console-published application (such as cmd.exe) window to full screen inside a MED-V workspace configured in seamless integration mode, the application window might disappear or not respond.

segment.source: When working in full desktop mode, icon locations on the desktop are not saved
segment.target: When working in full desktop mode, icon locations on the desktop are not saved

segment.source: When working in full desktop mode, manual location changes of icons on the desktop are not saved between MED-V workspace sessions.
segment.target: When working in full desktop mode, manual location changes of icons on the desktop are not saved between MED-V workspace sessions.

segment.source: A local image and a test image with the same name cannot exist in the same domain
segment.target: A local image and a test image with the same name cannot exist in the same domain

segment.source: If a local image is joined to the domain and the administrator creates a new version of the same image with the same computer name as a test image, when the test image joins the domain, either the join domain action fails or it succeeds and the local image is removed from the domain.
segment.target: If a local image is joined to the domain and the administrator creates a new version of the same image with the same computer name as a test image, when the test image joins the domain, either the join domain action fails or it succeeds and the local image is removed from the domain.

segment.source: MED-V does not support Windows Aero features
segment.target: MED-V does not support Windows Aero features

segment.source: MED-V does not support Windows Aero features (such as Aero Flip 3D).
segment.target: MED-V does not support Windows Aero features (such as Aero Flip 3D).

segment.source: The management console can be used by only one Windows user per computer
segment.target: The management console can be used by only one Windows user per computer

segment.source: The MED-V management console can be used only by administrators and the Windows user who installed the management application.
segment.target: The MED-V management console can be used only by administrators and the Windows user who installed the management application.

segment.source: The MED-V Server configuration utility tests Microsoft SQL Server connectivity under user context rather than under MED-V Server service context
segment.target: The MED-V Server configuration utility tests Microsoft SQL Server connectivity under user context rather than under MED-V Server service context

segment.source: MED-V uses MED-V Server service context to collect reports from the Microsoft SQL Server reports database.
segment.target: MED-V uses MED-V Server service context to collect reports from the Microsoft SQL Server reports database.

segment.source: The MED-V Server configuration utility verifies the database and tests the database connection string.
segment.target: The MED-V Server configuration utility verifies the database and tests the database connection string.

segment.source: It does not validate the access of MED-V Server service to the database.
segment.target: It does not validate the access of MED-V Server service to the database.
